price: Dhugumatti, Nuti ishee irraa namoota sammuu qabaniif mallattoo ifa taate hanbifnee jirra.
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡهَآ ءَايَةَۢ بَيِّنَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknā min'hā āyatan bayyinatan liqawmin yaʿqilūna
